Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.operations.handleid

Push events and Push operations for HandleId Calculation: This package contains classes to create and send push events and to invoke push operations which are used for HandleId calculation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractHandleIdPushOperation This is the base implementation for all Handle-ID Push Operations.
GenericUpperLayerHandleIdPushOperation This implementation of the PushOperation retrieves a foreign module specified by a generic upper layer parameter set as defined by the PduR.
HandleIdEvent Event to trigger push operations for HandleId generation.
PduLookupHandleIdCopyPushOperation Calculates handle-ids via references from other modules.
PduLookupHandleIdPushOperation This implementation of the PushOperation retrieves a foreign module related subset of a given list of handle-ids and creates zero-based and dense handle id umbers for this subset.
SimpleHandleIdPushOperation This implementation of the PushOperation makes a list of handle-ids zero-based-consecutive.
 

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.operations.handleid Description

Push events and Push operations for HandleId Calculation:

This package contains classes to create and send push events and to invoke push operations which are used for HandleId calculation.

The core classes for HandleId generation are:

  • HandleIdEvent: Event to trigger push operations for HandleId generation.
  • AbstractHandleIdPushOperation: base implementation for all Handle-ID Push Operations.
  • PduLookupHandleIdCopyPushOperation: Calculates handle-ids via references from other modules.
  • PduLookupHandleIdPushOperation:This implementation of the PushOperation retrieves a foreign module related subset of a given list of handle-ids and creates zero-based and dense handle id umbers for this subset.
  • SimpleHandleIdPushOperation: makes a list of handle-ids zero-based-consecutive.
